message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your offer, but unfortunately, it's a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This price reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us. Let's try to make this work!
